name: Pocket Defender
description:
A missile defender game with much more action!

For information on in-app-purchases, see below!

This game is under development. This means:

- There are a couple of bugs open left to fix

- The performance is not what it should be

- The game's difficulty and technology system may change a lot

Still, it's quite enjoyable already so I make it available for everyone as of now.

Advertisements:

The game shows advertisements through the game using Admob.

In-app-purchases:

Pocket Defender has in-app-purchase offers that will charge you in total not more than 5€ (no guarantee if there are further costs of providers involved!). The game is fully playable without paying: The sole advantage of buying the addition is that you'll earn credits 5 times faster. It does not affect highscores, it only quickens your pace of researching all technologies in the game.

Additionally, it's a pay-what-you-want model: You can chose between 3 price tiers and you can take the price that you believe to be fair for this app. Paying for the game will also disable advertisements (In case it doesn't, it's a bug. Let me know and I will fix it - this is still an alpha!).
